description: Twelve American finalists (six men and six women) compete in a singing contest.
keywords: talent game show,singing contest,pop music,music reality,based on british tv series
name: American Idol: The Search for a Superstar

review.name: I enjoy it, for the most part.
review.reviewBody: This is the first year (2005)that I've watched American Idol. I surprised myself and enjoyed it. It provides a look into the process and reasons for signing a person to a contract. The only thing that I don't like is the final weeks and how they let people know who has not made the cut. I find it cruel and unnecessary. I also find that Simon Crowell's comments are pretty accurate about the contestants. I used to watch Star Search, with Ed McMahon, and thought that was great, but this is much more interesting. I would like to see the handling of cutting contestants changed. I don't find this to be a popularity contest at all. I also think that if these people cannot take the criticism that is handed to them they should not be in the entertainment business.

trailer.name: American Idol: The Worst of Seasons 1-4
